sentences.en: This was a race of manly men , but insolent and impious.
sentences.cn: 这时的人类雄伟刚毅, 但却骄横不虔.

sentences.en: To have such notions about God is absurd and impious.
sentences.cn: 对上帝有这样见解的人是荒谬的,是不敬的.

sentences.en: Your calumny against the great is impious.
sentences.cn: 你对伟人的中伤有失虔敬.

words.tran_cn: 不虔诚的；不孝的；不敬的

trans.tran_cn: 不尊敬的，无信仰的，不虔诚的
trans.tran_en: lacking respect for religion or God
